violations.title: Proof of hepatitis A immunization
violations.narrative: Hepatitis A records not available on site for all current employees. Two employees must be removed from schedule until proof is provided.

violations.title: Clear and concise record keeping
violations.narrative: Hep A records not kept in clear, concise order. Records organized during inspection.

violations.title: Contamination prevented during preparation/storage/display
violations.narrative: Food not protected from contamination during preparation and on display.

violations.title: Plumbing installed/backflow prevention
violations.narrative: Y-valve on mop sink faucet requires proper backflow device.

violations.title: Physical facilities installed/maintained/clean
violations.narrative: Air gap at back entry door.

violations.title: Adequate ventilation and lighting
violations.narrative: Lighting intensity not sufficient in prep areas / equipment.

evidence.source_system: EnvisionConnect PressAgent (DecadeOnline) â€“ St. Louis County
